sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/alt-text */ /* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React, { useState } from "react"; import { MDBModal, MDBModalDialog, MDBModalContent, MDBModalHeader, MDBModalTitle, MDBModalBody, MDBModalFooter, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; import { Link, Outlet, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { Tooltip } from "react-tooltip"; export default function Nav() { const location = useLocation(); const name = location.state.name; const mail = location.state.mail; const city = location.state.city; const [centredModal, setCentredModal] = useState(false); const toggleShow = () => setCentredModal(!centredModal); const [cityy, setCityy] = useState(false); const toggleShow1 = () => setCityy(!cityy); const handleclick = async () => {}; return ( <>
FlixBooking
  • Bookings
  • About
{city} {" "} {" "}
User Details

Name of the User : 

{name}

Email of the User  : 

{mail}
); }
